text: Ami pratyeka um'matera madhye'i rasula prerana karechi e'i marme ye, tomara allahara ebadata kara ebam taguta theke nirapada thaka. Atahpara tadera madhye kichu sankhyakake allaha hedayeta karechena ebam kichu sankhyakera jan'ye bipathagamita abadharita haye gela. Sutaram tomara prthibite bhramana kara ebam dekha mithyaropakaridera kirupa parinati hayeche.
